1582952400.title: A Conversation with Veerathai Santiprabhob
1582952400.descr: Bloomberg talk with Veerathai Santiprabhob, the Governor of the Bank of Thailand since 2015, about his career.

1582954200.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
1582954200.descr: Emily Chang sits down with the biggest influencers in technology & media to find out who they are, how they got there, and where they're going. Bloomberg Studio 1.0 is a series of in-depth conversations with the very people shaping the future of business, underscoring their visions for what comes next.

1582956000.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1582956000.descr: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East live from Dubai, connects Asian markets to the European opens. The show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.

1582959600.title: Bloomberg Money Undercover
1582959600.descr: Bloomberg Money Undercover looks at the world of private debt, equity and real estate. Lisa Abramowicz meets investors who are pouring money into the private market at an unprecedented level.

1582961400.title: Bloomberg Commodities Edge
1582961400.descr: Alix Steel talks to the top executives from the commodity world to discuss the biggest stories and trends in the market.

1582963200.title: Bloomberg Businessweek
1582963200.descr: Bloomberg Television takes you behind the scenes of our award winning magazine "Bloomberg Businessweek".

1582966800.title: Best of Bloomberg Technology
1582966800.descr: Catch-up with the latest technology news from around the world with host Emily Chang from Bloomberg's San Francisco studios.

1582970400.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
1582970400.descr: Bloomberg Real Yield focuses on global issues and events that directly affect debt markets. Host Jonathan Ferro discusses stories from the fixed income world with the biggest names in the field. The show provides critical intelligence and analysis, allowing its audience to stay ahead of the competition.

1582972200.title: Leaders with Lacqua
1582972200.descr: Mark Carney. Francine Lacqua has a wide-ranging conversation with the outgoing Bank of England governor about his successes, challenges, and of course, Brexit.

1582974000.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week

1582983000.title: At the Top
1582983000.descr: Kim Fornais, Saxo Bank, CEO & Founder. Saxo Bank serves clients in over 170 countries and processes over a million transactions a day. CEO and Founder Kim Fournais joins us in Dubai.

1582984800.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
1582984800.descr: Philanthropist and financier David Rubenstein uncovers inside stories from the most influential minds in business.

1582986600.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
1582986600.descr: Bloomberg ETF IQ is the first and only show solely focusing on the opportunities, risks, and current events in the Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) industry, which now represent 30% of all U.S. equity trading. Bloomberg's Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in this market, providing critical intelligence to financial advisers and investors of ETFs.
